Here some more info: The default JRE was not set to 1.5 in the workspace. Some of the projects (but not all) had the 1.4 JRE library included. After I changed the default JRE everything compiled cleanly. So I'll close this.
Hmm ... still shouldn't be able to crash it like this, regardless of whether the JRE setting was correct ...
